Articles.Content:
greetings all! I've been playing KSP- even using some mods- from way back when the Stardock was still a thing, but I never got around to actually making an account here before now.

so I thought I'd drop in and say 'Hi' on the introduction forum, since everyone else is doing it.

Hi.

there, I said it. now to get back to that abort-to-Jool....
Hello Mechtech, and welcome to our forum.
